channel.title: Easy delta shit!
channel.description: ok so i've got a delta source which i've been working on for months now... and i've made it so that if you click NPCID==943 then that npc chats what i want.... but when you click the "click here to continue" button at bottom of chat it just exits... how do i link the "click here to continue" button so that it goes to another chat?

item.title: Easy delta shit!
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Case 40:

You need to link all your dialogue cases and put it there.

Read full topic
